name: Randy S. KINKEAD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
431 A.2d 280
Randy S. KINKEAD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania.

Submitted Jan. 22, 1981.
Decided July 10, 1981.
Alan Ellis, Philadelphia, for appellant.

Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
